archimate:Grouping.name: Application and SOA Monitoring and Management
archimate:Grouping.documentation: This category of capabilities provides monitoring and management of software services and applications. This includes the ability to capture metrics and to monitor and manage application and solution status.

properties.value: Application and SOA Monitoring and Management

This category of capabilities provides monitoring and management of software services and applications. This includes the ability to capture metrics and to monitor and manage application and solution status.
